summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to borrow not to exceed $2,100,000 from a Seattle bank or banks at an interest rate not to exceed 5-1/2% per annum, to be rapaid by June 30, 1978 solely from gross revenues of the Solid Waste Utility system, or from the proceeds of Solid Waste Utility revenue bonds.
